links.*: A New Glossary of the Dialect of the Huddersfield District
Foreword to A New Glossary of the Dialect of the Huddersfield District
The Chill Barbarians of the North
The Return of the King (1980 film)

wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
*'''[[12 January|12]]''' - ''[[A New Glossary of the Dialect of the Huddersfield District]]'', containing a [[Foreword to A New Glossary of the Dialect of the Huddersfield District|Foreword]] by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], is published.
*'''[[22 January|22]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] reads a paper, [[The Chill Barbarians of the North]], at a meeting of the Newman Society, in Oxford.
==February==
*'''[[9_Febuary|9]]''' - [[Frank Frazetta]], who would create illustrations for [[The Hobbit]] and [[The Lord of the Rings]] is born.

==March==
*'''[[27 March|27]]-[[28 March|28]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] works on the latter part of [[Lay of Leithian Canto IV|Canto IV]] of ''[[Lay of Leithian]]''.
==April==
*'''[[7 April|7]]''' - ''The Tablet'' reports about [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s paper "[[The Chill Barbarians of the North]]".
==June==
*'''[[6 June|6]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] is [[The Meaning of Everything|invited to a dinner]] marking the completion of the ''[[Oxford English Dictionary]]''.
==July==
*'''[[22 July|22]]''' - [[Orson Bean]], who would voice [[Bilbo Baggins]] in [[The Hobbit (1977 film)|''The Hobbit'' (1977 film)]] and [[Frodo Baggins]] (as well as Bilbo) in ''[[The Return of the King (1980 film)|The Return of the King]]'', is born.
==September==
*'''[[17 September|17]]''' - [[Roddy McDowall]], who would voice [[Samwise Gamgee]] in [[The Return of the King (1980 film)|''The Return of the King'' (1980 film)]], is born.
==December==
*'''[[20 December|20]]''' - [[Father Christmas]] writes a [[Letters from Father Christmas|letter]] to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s children.
*'''[[25 December|25]]''' - Father Christmas writes a letter to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s children.
*'''[[29 December|29]]''' - [[Bernard Cribbins]], who would narrate several episodes of [[Jackanory]]'s telling of ''[[The Hobbit]]'', is born.
==?==
*'''?''' - Tolkien assists Sir Mortimer Wheeler in the unearthing of a Roman Asclepieion at Lydney Park, Gloucestershire.
*'''?''' - Tolkien draws "[[Owlamoo]]".

{{Years|1925|1926|1927|1928|1929|1930|1931|}}
